detail_desc: Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top and a pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and a wrapover, double-layered hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front and unlined, drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication, and flared hems.
Oversized shirt dress in viscose twill with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, text print on the front and a straight-cut hem.
Printed top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with inset lace sections at the back and wide lace trims at the cuffs.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and concealed elastication at the hem.
Swim pants and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Print-patterned top with long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with a frill at the top and lined gusset. UPF 50.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a lightweight stretch cotton weave with a sheen. Elastication with decorative gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with trumpet cuffs and ties. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a rubber print and plastic details. Ribbed top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in a crinkled weave in a relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs.

Joggers in sturdy, slightly heavier jersey made from a cotton blend with covered elastication, a drawstring and a press-stud at the waist. Diagonal welt pockets at the front and one welt back pocket. Straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the front of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a low-cut back with crossover straps. Glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt.
Dance shoes in shimmering imitation leather with elastication around the top and a faux fur pompom on the front. Woven cotton linings and soft suede soles.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: PETITE Merry HW Slim Mom dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Jersey-lined trousers in cotton twill with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and straight legs.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening, concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Double-layered flutter sleeves, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
T-shirt bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Short-sleeved, V-neck tunic in soft denim with pin-tucks around the neckline, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with plastic beads and hole embroidery on the shoulders.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Smocked stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Jumper in a fine-knit merino wool blend with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in textured, double-weave organic cotton with narrow, covered elastication at the waist.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder dress in soft viscose jersey with elastication and a second layer of fabric at the top with short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the at the waist and a long slit at the hem.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and grosgrain trim around the top. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with reversible sequins.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and raw-edge hems.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and patch front pockets.

Soft, padded nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Fitted, padded jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar with integral hood. Zip down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck that has gathered elastication at the front and a small lace trim. Long sleeves with a slight puff at the shoulders.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, patch front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
Dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, front pockets, back pockets and press-studs at the sides.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt at the side.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Halterneck bralette in soft lace with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a pair of dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Dungarees with concealed press-studs at the crotch, straps with a button on the shoulders,a kangaroo pocket with printed appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with lapped shoulders and long-sleeves.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a wrapover bodice that ties at the waist. Gently gathered 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves, a seam at the hips and a peplum.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with an opening at the top and small frilled collar with ties at the front. Yoke at the back, a seam under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce a the hem.
V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top of the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with elastication at the top and two flounces that continue over the arms. Unlined.
Tube scarf in a soft knit.
Ankle-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a wide flounce at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front, notch lapels and a tie belt at the waist. Detachable tab with metal press-studs at the cuffs, and pockets in the side seams. Fitted with a gentle flare to the hem. Lined.
